name: L'employé parfait
description:
L'employé parfait is a game about a cop who does everything at (literally) the last minute.

Play many mini-games, manage and optimize your time before your boss arrives !

Will you make it to the payday ?

This game was made during the gameweek (5 days to make a game) at ISART DIGITAL by :

  • Marine Coiffard - Game artist [Mail] [Artstation]
  • Louis Fabre - Sound designer [Mail]
  • Ryad Godard - Game designer/Programmer [Portfolio]
  • Mateo Manjon - Game artist [Portfolio]
  • Léo Mourot - Programmer [Mail]
  • Garance Royère - Game artist [Portfolio]

We won the gameplay prize at this event !

Seen on :

Rock paper shotgun----------WhyBeAre--------Ksuma[FR]----------Terrible Gamers

The Legend of Jonnii ------------ Les Pizza Guys [FR]

The game is free !

You can donate to help us funding the greenlight submission fee to get our best games on steam, if you liked the game (each $ is more than enough for us :) )

My other games :

  • ShadoWalker
